sentences.simplifiedText: 吃太多肉就会对你的肠道有害。
sentences.traditionalText: 吃太多肉就會對你的腸道有害。
sentences.pinyin: Chī tài duō ròu jiù huì duì nǐ de chángdào yǒuhài.
sentences.translation: Eating too much meat can harm your intestines.

sentences.simplifiedText: 医生说，他的肠道有一些问题，需要进行一次手术以修复。
sentences.traditionalText: 醫生說，他的腸道有一些問題，需要進行一次手術以修復。
sentences.pinyin: Yīshēng shuō, tā de chángdào yǒu yīxiē wèntí, xūyào jìnxíng yīcì shǒushù yǐ xiūfù.
sentences.translation: The doctor said that there are some issues with his intestines and he needs to have a surgery to fix them.
